preConditions.sqlCheck: select count (a.relname) from pg_class a where a.relname ='case_event' and Not Exists (SELECT c.relname FROM pg_class c WHERE c.relkind = 'S' and c.relname = 'case_event_id_seq')
select count (a.relname) from pg_class a where a.relname ='case_data' and Not Exists (SELECT c.relname FROM pg_class c WHERE c.relkind = 'S' and c.relname = 'case_data_id_seq')
select count (a.relname) from pg_class a where a.relname ='case_users_audit' and Not Exists (SELECT c.relname FROM pg_class c WHERE c.relkind = 'S' and c.relname = 'case_users_audit_id_seq')
